thread.title: Mother & Daughter get away
thread.title_full: Mother & Daughter get away - Review of Crowne Plaza London Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: slinger2014
title: Mother & Daughter get away
text:
I was pleased, to say the least, to join my daughter in London for her birthday. The Crowne Plaza exceeded our expectations from the front desk staff to the housekeeping staff. I am looking forward to my next visit to London and will most definitely stay at the Crowne Plaza.
Anyone traveling to London should consider staying here, you won't be disappointed.
